Name: Crescent Blade Dervish
Prerequisite: Dex 13, Int 13, Combat Expertise, Exotic Weapon Proficiency (crescent blade), BAB +2
Description: In the thick of battle, your crescent blades spin in arcs of glittering death, striking faster than the eye can follow.

Name: Crescent Blade Master
Prerequisite: Dex 13, Int 13, Exotic Weapon Proficiency (crescent blade).
Description: You have perfected the use of crescent blades, gaining a deadly control to which few have ever aspired..
